name: Monitoring csrf attacks
tagline: A tool to monitor web server's log files against CSRF attacks.
body:
# MonCSRF: CSRF defenses for Apache + ModSecurity. 

A tool to monitor web server's log files against CSRF attacks.

* [Some examples of modifications for modsecurity for Apache.](https://bitbucket.org/mariwahl/configuring-a-custom-log-at-apache)

* [Over 50 solved exercises on basic concepts on computer security and attacks.](http://astro.sunysb.edu/steinkirch/books/security_hw.txt)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
